participant_2.background:
I'm curious about how to overcome my shyness.
i started a small blog lately to post reviews.
i have not had to work a day in my life.
I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.

content.text: What's up? How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing okay, I'm just curious about how to overcome my shyness.
Oh interesting, why do you want to overcome your shyness?
I think it would be really helpful in my career, and I'd like to be able to meet new people more easily.
I totally understand, I used to be really shy myself. I think the best way to overcome shyness is to just put yourself out there and try new things. The more you do it, the easier it will get.
That's a good point, I'll try to do that more often. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! What else have you been up to lately?
I started a small blog lately to post reviews of restaurants I've been to. It's been really fun, and I've been getting some good feedback from readers.
That's awesome! I love reading restaurant reviews, so I'll have to check out your blog.
Thanks, I'd love to hear what you think!
So, you said you haven't had to work a day in your life. How come?
I'm lucky enough to have a trust fund from my grandparents, so I don't have to worry about money.
That's awesome! I wish I had a trust fund!
Yeah, it's definitely a huge advantage. But I also know that I'm lucky to have it, and I try to be grateful for what I have.
That's great! I think it's important to be grateful for what you have, no matter how much or little it is.
